Text: thank u for this, been bummed that they wont release any seasons past  season2 on dvd. I bought both dvd sets of season 1 and 2,

Well done for this and the other torrents. I've been waiting for this for years.

If you're D/L this you're a fan - be a good sport and seed when you're finished. I intend to seed 5 seasons from 0000 - 0800. We owe it to everyone out there who loves this series...
Yes, I am so surprised I found this - thank you
